com.ontotext.s4.api.util

Class TypeSystemUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ontotext.s4.api.util.TypeSystemUtils

  • public class TypeSystemUtils
extends Object
    A utilities class giving functionality for generating and regenerating UIMA type system components as java classes and xml descriptors.
    Since:
    2015-03-18
    Author:
    Tsvetan Dimitrov

    • Method Detail

      • generateTypeSystemFile

        public static String generateTypeSystemFile(String descriptorDir,
                            org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineDescription analysisEngineDesc,
                            String serviceType)
        Generate type system description file.
        Parameters:
        descriptorDir - output directory of the file
        analysisEngineDesc - analysis engine descritor object used for serializing its in-memory type system to xml
        serviceType - S4 service type: sbt, news, twitie
        Returns:
        path to type system descriptor file

      • generateJCasGenClasses

        public static void generateJCasGenClasses(String typeSystemFilePath,
                          String... outputDir)
        Generate UIMA type system classes using jcasgen tool.
        Parameters:
        typeSystemFilePath - path to type system xml descriptor
        outputDir - output directory for the java classes

      • readCsv

        public static List<String[]> readCsv(String input,
                     char fieldSeparator,
                     char fieldEnclosedBy)
                              throws IOException
        Read csv file.
        Parameters:
        input - file content
        fieldSeparator - separator of the csv fields
        fieldEnclosedBy - enclosing field character
        Returns:
        a list of csv rows
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTypeSystemDescription

        public static org.apache.uima.resource.metadata.TypeSystemDescription createTypeSystemDescription(List<String[]> annotationTypes,
                                                                                  String serviceType)
        Create a TypeSystemDescription object used for setting a type system to an AnalysisEngineDescription
        Parameters:
        annotationTypes - list of table rows containing the annotation name and annotation features
        serviceType - S4 service type: sbt, news, twitie
        Returns:
        TypeSystemDescription object used for setting a type system to an AnalysisEngineDescription

      • generateTypeSystemDynamically

        public static void generateTypeSystemDynamically(String descriptorDir,
                                 org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReaderDescription readerDesc,
                                 org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineDescription annotatorDesc,
                                 String serviceType,
                                 List<org.apache.uima.resource.metadata.TypeSystemDescription> cachedTypeSystemDescriptions)
                                          throws org.apache.uima.UIMAException,
                                                 IOException,
                                                 SAXException
        Generate type system dynamically based on raw documents that you feed it.
        Parameters:
        descriptorDir - type system descriptor xml file output directory
        readerDesc - CollectionReaderDescription object
        annotatorDesc - AnalysisEngineDescription object
        serviceType - S4 service type: sbt, news, twitie
        cachedTypeSystemDescriptions - list of aggregated TypeSystemDescriptions which are later merged into one in order to get one TypeSystemDescription with aggregated types
        Throws:
        org.apache.uima.UIMAException
        IOException
        SAXException

      • patchMatchingFeatureNamesWithUimaReservedKeywords

        public static String patchMatchingFeatureNamesWithUimaReservedKeywords(String feature)
        A method fixing feature names matching UIMA reserved keywords like "class" or "type".
        Parameters:
        feature - the feature name to be patched
        Returns:
        the new pathched feature name

      • removeDashes

        public static String removeDashes(String typeName)
        Removes dashes from UIMA Annotations because they are not allowed to contain dashes.
        Parameters:
        typeName - the annotation name of the current annotation of the source document
        Returns:
        the transformed annotation name suited for the UIMA typesystem
